title: RTP Control Protocol (RTCP) Extended Report (XR) Blocks for Synchronization Delay and Offset Metrics Reporting
source: Metric Blocks for use with RTCP's Extended Report Framework RAI
abstract:
This document defines two RTP Control Protocol (RTCP) Extended Report (XR)
blocks that allow the reporting of initial synchronization delay and
synchronization offset metrics for use in a range of RTP applications.
